name: Survive: Get the battery
description:
Survive: Getting the Drum is a challenging puzzle platform in a science fiction world where you control a droid and need to find many batteries to improve your life.

This game was made by David Sousa and Derek Souza during the 72 hours of the Ludum Dare 39 (2017). The theme was "Running out of Power".

(Sorry about occasional bugs, is incomplete).
